content.html: Yet another OSS vampire show up: Vampire: We have a big production issue with your code. Me: Could you upload a reproducible example or a send a PR to fix it? Vampire: No, we just migrated away from your code because we had so many problems with it. Me: <close the issue>
content.value:
Yet another OSS vampire show up:

Vampire: We have a big production issue with your code.

Me: Could you upload a reproducible example or a send a PR to fix it?

Vampire: No, we just migrated away from your code because we had so many problems with it.

Me: <close the issue>
